description: Listen to music and watch videos mpv-android is a video player for Android based on libmpv. Features: * Hardware and software video decoding * Gesture-based seeking, volume/brightness control and more * libass support for styled subtitles * Secondary (or dual) subtitle support * Advanced video settings (interpolation, debanding, scalers, ...) * Play network streams with the "Open URL" function * Background playback, Picture-in-Picture, keyboard input supported
